original_title: Charlie Chan in The Jade Mask
overview: The latest assignment for respected detective Charlie Chan has come directly from the government and involves the disappearance of a scientist named Harper, who was working on an extremely important serum. When the scientist is killed, Chan must sort through all very likely suspects, including the man's sister and his butler.
tagline: A MYSTERY MANSION...Where death lurks in every dark corner and a mad genius runs loose!
title: Charlie Chan in The Jade Mask
